text: Renee Maria Montoya is a fictional character appearing in American comic books published by DC Comics. The character was created for Batman: The Animated Series and was introduced into mainstream comics before the airing of her animated debut in 1992. == Fictional character biography == Renee Montoya was a detective from the Gotham City Police Department, assigned to the Major Crimes Unit who comes into contact with masked vigilante Batman. She is a lesbian and resigns from the police force, disgusted by its corruption. == In other media == The character made her first live action debut on the first season of Gotham played by Victoria Cartagena. She will make her cinematic debut in the movie Birds of Prey (and the Fantabulous Emancipation of One Harley Quinn) portrayed by Rosie Perez. ==References== Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1992 Category:DC Comics characters Category:Fictional lesbians
title: Renee Montoya
